text:
@SenSchumer The most amazing and confounding thing:

President Trump announced he’s using DPA for meatpacking plants, but he still hasn’t fully invoked the DPA for COVID-19 testing.

Why?

We're not going to be able to open our food facilities and so many other things safely without testing!
